Home.heroText: Find and book tickets for concerts, conferences, and more in your city!
Home.organizerCtaText: Create and manage events with ease. Join as an organizer today!

eventReviews.title: Submitting Event Reviews
eventReviews.description: After attending an event, you can share your experience by submitting a review. Here's how:
eventReviews.step1: Purchase a ticket and attend the event.
eventReviews.step2: Go to the event page at /b2c/events/[eventId].
eventReviews.step3: Find the review section, select a rating (1â€“5 stars), and write your comment.
eventReviews.step4: Submit your review. It will appear on the event page after moderation.

calendarIntegration.title: Adding Events to Your Calendar
calendarIntegration.description: Add events to Google Calendar or download an iCal file to stay organized:
calendarIntegration.step2: Click 'Add to Google Calendar' to open Google Calendar with pre-filled event details.
calendarIntegration.step3: Alternatively, click 'Download iCal' to save a .ics file for other calendar apps like Outlook or Apple Calendar.

surgePricing.title: Understanding Surge Pricing
surgePricing.description: Ticket prices may increase based on demand or limited availability:
surgePricing.point1: High demand (e.g., many tickets sold quickly) may add a {velocitySurge}% price increase.
surgePricing.point2: Low availability (less than {availabilityThreshold}% tickets remaining) may add a {availabilitySurge}% price increase.
surgePricing.point3: Check the checkout page for current prices, marked with '(Surge Pricing Applied)' when applicable.

bulkRefunds.title: Managing Bulk Ticket Refunds (Organizers)
bulkRefunds.description: Organizers can refund multiple tickets at once:
bulkRefunds.step1: Go to /b2b/organizer/tickets in the organizer dashboard.
bulkRefunds.step2: Select an event and view its tickets.
bulkRefunds.step3: Check the boxes next to tickets you want to refund.
bulkRefunds.step4: Click 'Refund Selected Tickets' to process refunds via M-Pesa.
bulkRefunds.step5: Waitlist users will be notified if tickets become available.
